content.rendered:
beauty bar in oshawa | THE TEN SPOT®

welcome to 10spot® beauty bar on yonge + lawrence, toronto. our team is full of skilled experts who know how to make you look and feel your best! we offer a variety of services like waxing, facials, nail care, and laser hair removal. when you visit us, our awesome team will set you on track to taking the steps to feeling #LikeATen®

book now!
gift certificates
buy a series
buy a membership
newsletter sign-up

Get Directions

Add Waypoint
show options hide options
Print directions Reset directions
Fetching directions......
Reset directions
Print directions
beauty bar in oshawa | THE TEN SPOT®
  • 491 gibb st #1 oshawa, ontario
  • 905-434-6800
  • oshawa@thetenspot.com

  • licensed to serve alcohol

Hours

mon. 9:00 am – 4:00 pm

tues. - fri. 9:00 am – 7:00 pm

sat. - sun: 9:00 am – 4:00 pm

our beauty bar services

nails

we offer the best mani pedi in town! we offer nail extensions, gel nails, pedicures, and many more.

See services menu

waxing

we offer top notch waxing services designed to make you #feellikeaten like our brazilly®, thongkini®, general full body waxing, and much more.

See services menu

facials

our team has serious skills when it comes to facial treatments. we offer stress-free facial procedures like anti-aging facials, dermaplaning, chemical peels, and many more.

See services menu

brows

what better way to spoil yourself than by getting your brows and lashes done. wether you’re looking for lash lifts, brow lams, or more, we do it all.

See services menu

laser

hair removal can be tricky, thats why we make it simple with our awesome lineup of laser hair removal treatments like our bikini laser, full body laser, and much more.

See services menu
book now at this location

Check out our awesome reviews!

I have never been to a Ten Spot I didn't like, but I would highly recommend Chandni at the Oshawa location. She did both my brows and my pedicure and was friendly, kind, and meticulous. Absolutely will be re-booking with her.
Danielle Woodcock
1718827197
I come here often with my mom for manis, pedis, and waxing and they are always super nice, friendly, and welcoming. The place is very clean and they have amazing attention to detail when doing work. I have never felt rushed or felt like the service I booked wasn’t done properly. Would definitely recommend
Arushi Katyal
1718050838
Staff is all so friendly, great atmosphere and my services have always been great! I would definitely recommend them for a gel mani or the laser hair removal. The laser tech is professional, well trained and takes her time to make sure your experience is a 10
Jessica
1714494099
First time in a Ten SpotVery clean and brightI saw Rachel for several services including a mani/pedi. She was awesome! Will definitely be back 👍🏻
Elle Eh
1714064462
I enjoy a facial every month and cannot rave enough about how incredible the staff make me feel. The knowledgeable staff always ensures I have the best products for my skin. I look forward to feeling refreshed every time I visit. Highly recommended.
Michelle Williams
1712970714
Always a wonderful experience when getting a service done at this location. Denise is always very friendly and I appreciate her professionalism.
Margaret LaTour
1711900873
Got an eyebrow and full leg wax done by Rachel. She was very nice, I was pretty happy with my eyebrows especially since it was the first time I let anyone else other than myself do them! She was faster than I anticipated. Overall I’m pretty happy with my experience today, and will be back to try out their other services!
Lavi
1699472538
Thank you for such a lovely day with my friend and her daughter for her 9th birthday. We love our Mani pedis! The staff was very sweet and did wonderful jobs.
Alicia B
1693188381
Got the BINB gel overlay done and looks absolutely beautiful and the colour is exactly want I wanted. Service wasn't rushed either which was nice. I did notice a little spot on my pinky nail though that should of been filed down a bit more, but when I go for a fill I can get that done. All in all it was a pleasant and relaxing time.
Lisa Patterson
1690667314
‹
›
